COMPETITOR ANALYSIS 4:
Title: Adidas Target Market
Content: Jul 1, 2025 — Adidas' target market spans the footwear, apparel, and sports equipment niches . It is among the top ten largest clothing brands worldwide.
Source: https://bstrategyhub.com/adidas-target-market/
